issue.title: www.hulu.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.hulu.com/watch/a3dea9b5-6df3-47fb-84ac-a6a4e90a91d8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Fwatch%2Fa3dea9b5-6df3-47fb-84ac-a6a4e90a91d8) ### Comment > Trying to watch Hulu on Safari with the AdGuard for Safari extension active, however there are still ads popping up at the start of each new episode. I also notice the runtime for these episodes are longer and the ads are a part of the runtime. I have the AdGuard extension installed on Google Chrome as well with the same exact settings and Hulu works perfectly fine over there. Normal episode runtime and all ads are blocked without issues. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/wd8baevxfjkswk80oo400w0s0k8w08ilcz7v1zf3co.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.22 System version: | `MacOS Sequoia 15.5` Filters: | Ad blocking:

issue.title: https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Ublock Origin Lite

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js

### Ad Blocking

EasyList, AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

We have received a report (link to our bug report: https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-82567) that `fr ca Adguard Francais` is causing `https://canvas-frontend.prod-east.frontend.public.atl-paas.net/assets/adf-INlYroUw.js` to be blocked when dynamically loaded within [Atlassian Confluence Whiteboards](https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/whiteboards) which causes the app to not work correctly.

This problem seems to have emerged around 19 August and has been reported by several of our customers.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
